name: The Idle Lumberer
description:
The Idle Lumberer is a simplistic idle game.

You simply chop down trees for logs, sell them at the Lumber Hut and buy upgrades to improve your game experience. If you reach a certain amount of trees chopped as well as collected enough money you will be capable to prestige, allowing you to gain prestige currency to buy upgrades that empower your game permanently.

[Android Version Recommended]
